data.description: Easy OO to DBMS mapper for complex data
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module has the potential to be very widely used. It makes perl
    data persistent with no fuss, complication, or forthought.

    OOPS stands for Object Oriented Persistent Store. It's also a word
    that reflects the difficulty in building the module.

    I have previously asked for naming suggestions.
